resources.string: Please reveal the covered decryption phrase on your monero gift card and enter it below
1. Download cake wallet from the app store here
3. Enter a pin then choose \"Monero(XMR)\" and click next
4. Enter a wallet name of your choice then copy and paste the following where it says "Enter your seed phrase"
5. Make sure \"Legacy(25 words)\" is selected NOT \"Polyseed(16 words)\"
6. Click \"Restore from date\" and select the following date

7. Click \"Restore\" and wait for cake wallet to sync with the rest of the blockchain. This may take some time but once it is synchronized you will be able to spend the XMR. It is recommended to create a new wallet and send the funds there as the gifter of the wallet has access to the funds. This guide may be helpful if you are confused on how to do this.
Click to copy seed phrase for giftwallet
Enter a monero wallet address to redeem funds too. If you aren\'t sure how to do this follow this guide to create a wallet. Next click receive in cake wallet then copy and paste the address below.
THIS ACTION CANNOT BE UNDONE CHECK YOUR WALLET ADDRESS BEFORE CONFIRMING
